name: 挙式VR 鴻上大和 編 Wedding VR : Yamato
description: The happy-full VR experience comes to Oculus Rift! This much-talked-about VR experience is now playable in the palm of your hand! ■Feel as if he’s right in front of you! The groom, Yamato Kougami, is waiting you in the church. It feels as if you could reach out and touch him...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
